title: So you are giving a generalist mage one shot potential and lane sustain
body: Yeh riot, nothing will go wrong with this what so ever

replies.body: Except it's literally impossible for Ahri "one shot" anyone unless they're lv 1 and she's 18 with 1000 AP. Now if she EWQ-RRRs you to death that's not one shotting.

in all likelihood, {{champion:103}}

i hate it when threads are vague about it though lol
Yiu are correct but its not realy vague considering she is the only mage getting updated atm
